note.text: A free public XMPP service hosted in Austria brought to you by linuxlovers.at. Server messages and main website only in German.
The Jabber server of the Chaos Computer Club people in Jena, Germany.
An XMPP server in Germany, hosted by draugr.de.
The first Italian public XMPP server, all free with Jingle nodes.

Chrome.pl is a publicly available service for hosting custom XMPP domains. Additional services include e-mail account with address same as JID, maintained transports, active community and commercial deployments.
An XMPP server in Germany, hosted by i-pobox.net.
Public XMPP server hosted by Coderollers SRL.

CodingTeam.net is a forge for free (as in freedom) software projects. The Jabber server is mainly useful for communication inside CodingTeam projects (chatrooms integrated in the forge, presence for users, etc.) but is open to everyone.
comm.unicate.me UK based Jabber service.
An XMPP server in Germany, hosted by draugr.de.
XMPP server in Germany with a MUC service, a file transfer proxy, and more.
Driven by the German Jabber tutorial portal einfachjabber.de
A public self-hosted Jabber server located in France.
A free public jabber server maintained by the French association APINC.
A completely free public Jabber service whose main goal is 100% uptime. Operated by Flosoft.biz.
Former li-nux.de service, offering an ICQ transport.
Public Jabber service with web-registration and some transports.
The original Brazilian Jabber service. Run by Brazilian people, but hosted in USA.
A free Jabber service hosted by jabber.hot-chilli.net. This is an alternative domain, see website for details about our features like Jabber transports and Jabber services.
Austrian Jabber server with many features.
A Jabber Server operated by the Chaos Computer Club.
An XMPP server in Germany, hosted by i-pobox.net.
Representing the Jabber community in New Zealand.
Public service hosted by jabbim.cz
German Jabber Server - der Deutsche Jabber Server.
A UK XMPP server free to use for everyone
Online Social Community network in Nigeria with Instant messaging service
An XMPP server in Germany, hosted by i-pobox.net.
An XMPP service in Germany.

A free Jabber service for everybody by hot-chilli.net webhosting, a friendly and individual online services company in Germany. We offer serveral Jabber transports (ICQ, AIM, Yahoo, MSN, IRC) and numerous other Jabber services like JMC, JUD, MUC and Proxy65.
Jabber service with multiple hostnames, ICQ and AIM Transports, MUC-Service with simple IRC-Entry (Port 6668), RSS-Feeds, and more.
A free Jabber service from iITSP.
Delivering chat services in New Zealand, including transports to AIM, ICQ, and MSN.
Just Jabber Me! - Also supports IPv6!
A free Jabber service in New Zealand.
The first open Jabber server in Bulgaria.
Free Jabber server set up for Norwegian users in 2004. The service is provided free of charge and has also now an English web page due to the many users outside Norway.
The original XMPP service, in continuous operation since 1999.
A public XMPP server with several services like publish-subscribe and gateways to other proprietary IM networks. Hosted by Nauck IT KG.
An XMPP server free to use for everyone.
An XMPP server in Germany, hosted by i-pobox.net.
Just another Jabber Server in Germany.
An XMPP server in Germany, hosted by i-pobox.net.
A public XMPP server in Germany.
An XMPP server in Germany, hosted by i-pobox.net.
The Forest's Jabber Service.
Jabber Server of the German lotgd community.
Aims to deliver Jabber services on a server located in New Zealand, making connections easy and quick for New Zealand residents.
Jabber service for EU countries with an ICQ transport.
A server for the Spanish-language Jabber community. Hosted by the non-profit organization Aditel.
Public service hosted by jabbim.cz
Stable ejabberd clustered server with good support and many transports and services: ICQ, AIM, MSN, Facebook, Weather, Yahoo, Notes, bots, MUCs, proxy65, STUN server for voice support, and more
Public service hosted by jabbim.cz
Public service hosted by jabbim.cz
Jabber server from Indonesia.
A free XMPP service with transports, MUCs, a file tranfer proxy, twitter bot and more.
An open Jabber service in Poland.
A public Jabber instant messaging server in Austria.
The Jappix XMPP service.
A public Jabber server in Italy.
Driven by the German Jabber tutorial portal einfachjabber.de
LW.Org XMPP Public Service.
Public Jabber service with web-registration and some transports.
A small but reliable Jabber server. Not only for Mac users!
A free server for facilitating communication among business professionals in the world of real estate.
Just another free public XMPP service
Neko IM is a free public Jabber server, running Openfire, located in Sandnes, Norway.
A long-running, UK-based service with AIM / ICQ / MSN / Yahoo transports.
Public service hosted by jabbim.cz
Pandion IM users and others can use this server freely. Enjoy!
Just another ejabberd server based in Germany.

Programmer-art.org offers a free and easy to use XMPP server that is open to anyone. We offer offline message and private data storage, group chats, file and media sharing proxies, and simple instructions for setting up common clients with our server.
A free Jabber service in Germany.
Free public Jabber service with many capabilities and the best support for Ukrainian users. Located in UK.
An XMPP server free to use for everyone.
An XMPP server in Germany, hosted by i-pobox.net.
Swissjabber is a free XMPP service located in Zurich / Switzerland.
Swissjabber is a free XMPP service located in Zurich / Switzerland.
Swissjabber is a free XMPP service located in Zurich / Switzerland.
Swissjabber is a free XMPP service located in Zurich / Switzerland.
Swissjabber is a free XMPP service located in Zurich / Switzerland.
Another free XMPP service located in France.
Driven by the German Jabber tutorial portal einfachjabber.de
We aim for high availability, stability and openness. Our server is located in Germany and offers several transports (ICQ, MSN, IRC) and other services like MUC and Proxy65.
We aim for high availability, stability and openness. Our server is located in Germany and offers several transports (ICQ, MSN, IRC) and other services like MUC and Proxy65.

Univers Libre is a home server which offers jabber, mail and web accounts for everyone.

Another public Jabber server that supports connecting via Tor as a hidden service.
An XMPP server in Germany, hosted by draugr.de.
A free Jabber service hosted by jabber.hot-chilli.net. This is an alternative domain, see website for details about our features like Jabber transports and Jabber services.
A free public XMPP service hosted in Japan.
Jabber service with multiple hostnames, ICQ and AIM Transports, MUC-Service with simple IRC-Entry (Port 6668), RSS-Feeds, and more.

Our Jabber Server originally started for a couple of friends, but is also open for everyone else. We are respecting the privacy of everyone and trying to provide a high availability service. No conversations will be logged.
